patterns: what's the emergency number in the philippines
who do i call for police fire medical in PH
questions.answer: Unified Emergency Hotline — 911. One-number national emergency dispatch for police, fire, and medical.

patterns: who do i call for blood or red cross help
questions.answer: Philippine Red Cross — 143 (national). Use for blood services, disaster response, volunteer assistance and referrals.
UP-PGH National Poison Management & Control Center — (02) 8524-1078 / 0966-718-9904. Call immediately for suspected poisoning.
City of Dasmariñas Emergency Operations Center — (046) 435-0183 / (046) 481-0555 / mobile: 0917-721-8825. Use for city-level coordination and disaster queries.
Dasmariñas City Ambulance Center — (046) 686-3339 / (046) 851-0995 (verify availability during major incidents).
Dasmariñas Component City Police Station — (046) 416-2924 / (046) 416-0254. Mobile hotlines: 0998-598-5598 / 0956-800-3329.

patterns: who to call for fire in dasmariñas
questions.answer: Bureau of Fire Protection - Dasmariñas — (046) 416-0875 / (046) 424-2537. Mobile lines: 0995-336-9534.

patterns: who to call for provincial fire assistance
de la salle medical center contact
questions.answer: De La Salle University Medical Center (DLSUMC) Emergency — +63 46 481-8000 (ER extensions may vary). 24/7 tertiary hospital in Dasmariñas.
St. Paul Hospital Cavite — (046) 481-8270 / (046) 481-8271 / (046) 481-8272. Private hospital with ER services.
Dasmariñas City Medical Center / Pagamutan ng Dasmariñas — (046) 481-4400 / (046) 435-0180 (municipal health facility).

patterns: who to call for ambulance in dasma
questions.answer: DLSUMC Ambulance / Emergency Medicine Dept — call +63 46 481-8000 and request ambulance; mobile dispatch numbers vary by shift.
Datastat Ambulance Services (private) — 0956-431-6452 / 0908-771-5988 / 0998-991-9950. Fees apply; DOH accreditation recommended to confirm.
Philippine Red Cross - Dasmariñas unit — (046) 402-6267 / 0916-245-0527. Volunteer ambulance and blood unit referrals.
Meralco hotline — 16211 (general). Local Meralco contact lines may be provided by district offices; call 16211 to report outages and hazards.

patterns: who to call for phone outage
questions.answer: Telecom providers — PLDT: 171 (landline), Globe: 211 (Globe mobile). Use provider support to report service outages.
Philippine Red Cross - Dasmariñas Blood Collecting Unit — (046) 402-6267 / 0916-245-0527. Call for blood drives and transfusion referrals.

Sample barangay health stations (examples): Zone IV Health Center (near DLSUMC), Salitran I Barangay Health Station, Paliparan Barangay Health Station — call city EOC (046) 435-0183 to request specific barangay clinic numbers or 'add barangay list'.
